description: This 3D puzzle ball in a cool Batman design becomes an extraordinary night light with a clap of hands when the light base lets the ball shine from the inside. This sturdy 3D puzzle ball is created piece by piece from curved plastic puzzle pieces that fit together perfectly thanks to EasyClick Technology, without any gluing. The numbering of the pieces on the back makes pre-sorting easier and enables easy puzzling by numbers. Tip: With the included light base, many other motifs can be turned into a great night light!
